description: The humor lies in the literal interpretation of an 'impossible to put down' book, due to anti-gravity.
title: Gravity of Humor
n_1: Emily unveils her latest invention to Max: an anti-gravity book.
n_2: Max is intrigued, reaching out to the floating book.
n_3: They play with the book, unable to put it down.
n_4: Emily delivers the punchline as they relax.
c1_3: It literally can't be put down!
c1_4: I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
